Title: Haplous
Description: The Haplous library provides a simplified framework in which to build 2D games using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Haplous library provides a simplified framework in which to build 2D games using WPF.

Haplous consists of a framework assembly and sample project.

Version 0.5 is now available from nuget.org. Full documentation is included with the nuget package.

See the Downloads for sample projects.
